file_content.text: I am hunting, Kren! What cannot wait until I return?
Kren can't talk right now.
Your buddy's indisposed.
Hello, Vause. Remember me?
Surprise.
I'm tired of cleaning up the White Maw's trash.
You ready to fight me yet?
I came here to put you away. Nothing's gonna keep me from doing that.
Ayor, Gradak and Kren couldn't stop me. I don't think you can either.
I'm calling you out, Vause.
So, man-hunter has found sport after all.
I looked forward to hunting those men when time was right. It's shame to lose such worthy prey. It seems I must hunt new quarry.
No more hunting, Vause. This is a challenge, not a game.
Enough, I want you to face me.
This life is game, man-hunter.
You don't have a friend in the world, do you? Just your next meal.
You're sick.
Eat or be eaten. That is our only purpose. This is what Scorekeeper teaches us.
That'll teach you not to play with your food.
You snooze, you lose.
It is no matter. You will provide me sport of all three!
Hunter of such skill must possess great hoard of Jagganath. Scorekeeper will favor me for kill such as this.
Wait for me on observation deck. We will have room for battle there. I will look forward to gnawing your bones.
I'd say this is a trap, but I don't think the lizard's ever even heard of the word "forethought."
Uh, it's not too late to back out, is it?
Scout the battleground?
